note:
Professional chemist. Amateur baker. Bike commuter.

Favorite stars don't cost money and can make someone smile (or at least feel seen) so I use them often. I'm not being weird at you specifically, I'm being weird at everyone...

Warning for the new instance: the much higher character limit might cause me to go mad with power. Take that into account before following.

fields.name: ORCID (I guess this is a thing to do here?)
fields.value: https://orcid.org/0000-0002-0496-9316

fields.name: avatar
fields.value: Silver road bike with black panniers leaning against a very large diameter palm tree. Black bike shoes on the ground underneath.

fields.name: header image
fields.value: Row of six NMR tubes (clear, glass) with cap colors matching the classic pride flag (red, orange, yellow, green, blue, purple). Very small text with hand-written numbers in black on the tubes. The green tube is the one with the really cool sample in it.
